title: Dragon Breath Type Schema
description: Schema for defining dragon breath attack types with their visual effects and damage properties

items.description: Hex color code (without # prefix) used in the breath particle gradient. Multiple colors create a gradient effect.

colors.description: List of colors that form the gradient for the breath particles. The particles will transition between these colors.

damage.description: Base damage dealt by the breath attack to entities hit by it. Higher values cause more damage.

fire_time.description: Time in ticks that the target will be set on fire when hit by the breath. Set to 0 for breath types that don't cause fire.

particle_density.description: Density of particles in the breath attack. Higher values create more particles, making the breath appear thicker.

effect.description: Status effect identifier to apply to entities hit by the breath. Should be a valid effect ID.

duration.description: Duration of the effect in ticks. 20 ticks = 1 second.

amplifier.description: Amplifier level of the effect. 0 is level I, 1 is level II, etc.

chance.description: Chance (0.0 to 1.0) that this effect will be applied when an entity is hit by the breath.

effects.description: List of status effects to apply to targets hit by the breath attack.
